record.name: collective.contact.importexport.pipeline

field.title: Pipeline to use to import contacts

record.value:
[transmogrifier] pipeline = csvsource csvcleaner portaltypeinserter pathinserter constructor logger
[csvsource] blueprint = collective.transmogrifier.sections.csvsource filename = /Users/laurent/csvsource.csv fieldnames = societe_id Parent nom_court desc type upa adresse Num Compl cp LOCALITE Téléphone Portable fax email_general site_web Région Pays UID Contact_intene
[csvcleaner] blueprint = collective.contact.importexport.csvcleaner remove-header = true
[portaltypeinserter] blueprint = collective.transmogrifier.sections.inserter key = string:_type value = string:organization
[pathinserter] blueprint = collective.contact.importexport.pathinserter
[constructor] blueprint = collective.transmogrifier.sections.constructor
[logger] blueprint = collective.transmogrifier.sections.logger name = logger level = INFO
